TakeHealth
bool TakeHealth(
float 
flHealth,
int 
bitsDamageType,
int 
health_cap
= 
0
)

Takes health from this entity. Note: flHealth is added to entity health. Use negative values to subtract.If health_cap is non-zero, won't add more than health_cap. Returns true if it took damage, false otherwise.

int

=

Takes armor from this entity. Note: flArmor is added to entity armor. Use negative values to subtract.If armor_cap is non-zero, won't add more than armor_cap. Returns 1 if it took damage, 0 otherwise.

GetUserData
dictionary@ GetUserData()

Gets the user data on this entity. Do not keep references to this data, the object might be removed from this entity.

Only map scripts can use this.

GetUserData
dictionaryValue& GetUserData(
const string& 
in 
szKey
)

Gets the user data stored under the specified key on this entity.

Do not keep references to this data, the object might be removed from this entity.

Only map scripts can use this.

ClearUserData
void ClearUserData()

Clears the user data on this entity. WARNING: clears all data.

Only map scripts can use this.
